title.content-text: 8.2.2 - Analyzing the Effects of the Wild-card Mask

brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts a router connected to a switch with the following ACL inbound on F A 0 /0:

access-list 9 deny host 192.168.15.99
access-list 9 permit any

Network Topology
Four hosts are connected to the switch. Three of the hosts with the following IP addresses can transmit ok: 192.168.15.77, 192.168.15.22, and 192.168.15.33. The host with the IP address 192.168.15.99 cannot transmit.
